name: Lunar Lander (itch) (Jeremy Peifer)
description:
Controls:
Up arrow for thrust, left and right arrows to rotate, spacebar to use autopilot (uses more fuel)

Couple new things to note when playing this:
1. You have an autopilot - at the cost of extra fuel, this autopilot will self-correct and land for you, though don't do it too close to the ground as you WILL crash.
2. Your score directly influences the amount of fuel you have to work with. Don't crash too often, as it will influence your score.

The music is an old piece of mine! It is actually available to purchase over on my Bandcamp: https://peeftubemusic.bandcamp.com/track/constructive-ambiance
